text: seongseoui baegseongdeul-iyeo hananim-igyesihan geos-eul midgo geu ijeon-e neo huiwa hamkke iss-eossdeon geos-eul hwagjunghala hananim-eun geudeul-ui myeong-yeleul geodugo geudeul-eul humilo dollyeossnani ineun ha nanim-eseo ansig-il-eul jikiji anihanjadeul-eul jeojuhaessdeus geudeul-eul jeojuhadoda hananim-ui myeonglyeong-eun hangsang suhaengdoe nola
